s2.title: Introduction
s2.p: Xerces2 provides an implementation of SAX 2.0.1 and SAX2 Extensions 1.0.

s2.title: SAX Programmer's Guide
s2.p: This section provides the following topics:

ul.li: How do I? -- the most frequently asked questions about SAX.
SAX Samples -- documents various SAX samples included with Xerces.
